Black.description: Classic and rich black coffee, great for any time of day.

Cappuccino.description: Espresso mixed with steamed milk and a thick layer of foam on top. One of our best drinks.

Latte.description: Much steamed milk mixed with espresso, an excellent drink to start the day.

Flat White.description: A good balance between espresso and steamed milk. A flavourful mix.

Macchiato.description: An espresso shot with a layer of foam on top, two layers of goodness.

Pearl Milk Tea.description: Black tea mixed with powdered milk and with tapioca pearls. A classic favourite.

Green Pearl Milk Tea.description: The green tea version of pearl milk tea, a different flavour to enjoy.

Honey Pearl Milk Tea.description: Sweet honey syrup mixed with the original pearl milk tea, providing a sweeter experience.

Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea.description: Milk tea mixed with delicious brown sugar syrup and tapioca pearls. Great for brown sugar lovers.

Coca-Cola.description: Regular fizzy Coke drink, gets your throat bubbling.

Pepsi.description: A common competitor to the other well-known fizzy brand.

Fanta.description: Coming in several flavours, another enjoyable fizzy drink.

Ice Kachang.description: A favourite amongst Singaporeans, shaved ice with many delicious toppings.

Cendol.description: Cold coconut milk with delectable palm sugar syrup and green jelly. Great as a chilly dessert.

Pandan Cake.description: Sponge cake with the flavour of pandan leaves, a soft treat for your mouth.

Roti Prata.description: Crispy flatbread, goes well with curry, sugar or more. Use your hands!

Roti Tissue.description: Roti prata, but thinner, crispier and larger! Extremely tasty.

Tau Huay.description: Tasty soy beancurd, hot or cold. Comes with delicious you tiao!

Ice Cream Sandwich.description: Crispy biscuit with ice-cream that melts in your mouth. A variety of flavours to choose.
